Dank Wiki Generator

Jul 21, 2015

You can find our wiki generator here.

It makes use of the following technologies:

  • dank
  • Yeoman
  • Gulp
  • handlebars
  • SASS (libsass) and compass-mixins
  • Bower
  • NPM
  • Browserify
  • CoffeeScript

How this works

I have documented gulpfile.coffee and helpers.coffee which are the two core modules for all of this to work.

Usage

$ yo wikigenerator

You will then be asked a few questions. Please answer them politely. What is your team name, what year is it, etc. This answers will be used to scaffold out a bare wiki.

Features

The core of this generator is built around compiling one set of handlebars templates into a live and dev version. The dev version located within ./build-dev can be locally hosted with all navigational URIs pointing to local files. On the other hand, the live version located within ./build-live uses links that follow the iGEM Wiki namespacing conventions.

  • compile ./src/**/*.hbs into ./build-dev/**/*.html and ./build-live/**/*.html
  • working handlebars variables inside pages and templates

ToDos

  • implement markdown compiling for page content
  • make Yeoman generator
  • do live build for bower deps into one file
